name: NSDataAsset
desc: An object from a data set type stored in an asset catalog.

items.name: init?(name: NSDataAssetName)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an object with a reference to the named data asset in an asset catalog.

items.name: init?(name: NSDataAssetName, bundle: Bundle)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an object with a reference to the named data asset that is in an asset catalog in the specified bundle.

items.name: var data: Data
items.desc: The raw data values in the data asset.

items.name: var name: NSDataAssetName
items.desc: The name of the data set in the asset catalog.

items.name: typealias NSDataAssetName
items.desc: The name of a data asset.

items.name: var typeIdentifier: String
items.desc: The uniform type identifier for the data asset.
